channel.title: Help me with Runserver.bat?
channel.description: Hi when i go to my server files and click runserver.bat to start my server it says: 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, batch file or program. I have JDK 6 Update 16. I have tried over 10 server files, please help me fix this error! Here is the text that is inside runserver.bat: @echo off title NullPkz java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause PLEASE HELP ME!!!!!

item.title: Help me with Runserver.bat?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

@echo off java -Xmx500m server pause

Read full topic

item.title: Help me with Runserver.bat?
item.dc:creator: @Drommy Drommy
item.description:
@Drommy wrote:

Hi when i go to my server files and click runserver.bat to start my server it says: ‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command, batch file or program. I have JDK 6 Update 16. I have tried over 10 server files, please help me fix this error! Here is the text that is inside runserver.bat: @echo off
title NullPkz
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause
PLEASE HELP ME!!!

Read full topic
